tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I was initially very scared as that was my first dental visit. I was assigned to Dr.  Lavanya for my treatment.  I came with severe TMJ pain and even with wisdom tooth impaction. Doc Lavanya is very professional and yet very friendly too.  Frankly speaking whole staff is very friendly.  So,  coming to treatment, My TMJ problem completely treated, thanks to Doc, yes of course she advised everything related to TMJ problem. Later on,  gone ahead with wisdom tooth removal. It went fine under anesthesia... But yes..next day pain showed me stars. Everything takes time to heal, with prescribed meds I slowly started to recover. 

Doc Lavanya is very excellentb in her work. I strongly suggest ADITHRI Dental. Thanks to whole staff ðŸ˜Š.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Zirconia Crowns,Dental Crowns,
review:
I've had the pleasure of entrusting my dental care to Adithri Dental since 2016, and my experience with them has been consistently exceptional. The team, led by Chief Dentist and Surgeon Dr. Lavanya and supported by Dr. Tejaswi and Dr. Sreeja, has consistently provided me with compassionate dental care. The staff's commitment to building lasting patient relationships is truly admirable.

Dr. Lavanya has consistently demonstrated a high level of expertise and professionalism. Recently, I underwent a root canal and crown replacement under Dr. Lavanya's care. Her attention to detail, clear communication, and skillful approach instilled confidence in the procedure, making it a relatively seamless experience.

The collaborative efforts of Dr. Tejaswi and Dr. Sreeja were also evident throughout my treatment. Their dedication to patient well-being and their individual expertise complemented the overall quality of care.

The use of advanced dental technology at Adithri Dental further adds to the overall positive experience. The procedures, including the root canal and crown replacement, were conducted with precision and efficiency, minimizing discomfort and ensuring optimal results.

I wholeheartedly recommend Adithri Dental to anyone seeking dental treatment. Dr. Lavanya, Dr. Tejaswi, Dr. Sreeja, and the entire staff have consistently gone above and beyond to provide me with outstanding dental care, making them my trusted choice for all my dental needs. Thanks!!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
My name is Sambhasiva Rao and met with road traffic accident and my lower jaw of face was fractured with huge cut on my face. I visited Dr. Lavanya madam in adithri maxillofacial hospital where  I underwent fixation of my jaw fractures.
Dr. Lavanya madam done an excellent surgery with out much pain and scar on my face now I'm able to eat food and with in no time I am able to go to my job. Thank you verh much Dr . Lavanya madam for giving me a new life and I would like to recommend adithri maxillofacial center for all maxillofacial problems as  there are advanced equipment and patient care is excellent and staff are very much supportive. Thankyou.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Hi , I met with a road accident and fractured my face bones which made me unable to chew food and open my mouth. Visited adithri maxillofacial  hospital I'm diagnosed with left zygoma fracture. Dr Haranadh reddy sir and Dr.Lavanya mam done surgery for me with out any scar on my face .I'm very happy now a nd I'm able to chew food.. hospital as mbirnce is very good with pleasant music and advanced technology, staff are very friendly and my followup are very regular and thanks to whole team.spl thanks to Dr Haranadh Reddy sir and Dr. Lavanya mam.i recommend this hospital for all my friends and family.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
